title: BONUS: Venezuela's Rise and Fall
description: Venezuela is facing an economic and humanitarian crisis as extreme poverty and violence have forced many to flee the country in recent years. How did a country once wealthy with oil resources fall into such turmoil?

itunes:title: BONUS: Venezuela's Rise and Fall
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: How does a regime change alter the social fabric of a country?
